name: HOBO HORROR 2
description:
USE HEADPHONES. SOUND PANNING IS CRUCIAL.

There are built in controls in the how to play menu but if you thought you would skip that then here you go:

A and D: look left and right

W and S: on the third night you can look up and down.

S: When looking down the middle, this will pull up the thing you need to do.

spacebar: does the task while thing is pulled up.

left mouse: flashlight toggle.
